channel.title: Server crash after 30-45 minutes if someone logs out. This time with error
channel.description:
Hello guys!
I'm finally back from vacation and work. I put the server back online to get the error.
All the information about it u can see on this topic:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,671516.0.html
Here's the the error:
http://pastebin.com/jC9QVExt
Already thanks for helping!

item.title: Server crash after 30-45 minutes if someone logs out. This time with error
item.dc:creator: @qeruina qeruina
item.description:
@qeruina wrote:

Thanks for helping sk8r Me and my friend are now just trying to make the highscores and put our own SQL database into the client

Read full topic
item.source: Server crash after 30-45 minutes if someone logs out. This time with error

item.title: Server crash after 30-45 minutes if someone logs out. This time with error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Try deleting your “com” folder in your server files.

That won’t remove mysql. That will only create ANOTHER error, because the files to run MySQL are now missing.

OP:
We talked about this in private messages.
You have a class called SQL.java
The proof is in your error:

Again, like I said in the PM:
A) Delete/Move the SQL.java, and then delete any method instances within the other classes.
B) Delete the method instances in the other classes, but keep the SQL file for later use
C) Fix the MySQL problem by getting a MySQL database and connecting your server to it

Let me state this one more time, just to be clear.

There is absolutely no way your will resolve this error without modifying the SQL.java or the classes that use it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@qeruina wrote:

Well, i am not using anything to my SQL? It’s using the SQL from the previous user which is down. I’m totally not familiar with SQL. Please do not leave me with this SQL problem if it doesn’t take that long. I really want it to work

Already thanks for answering!

Qeruina
